summary.span: 取得或設定資料行是否可以包含 null 值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a column can contain null values.
Default = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將此值設定為`false`，對應的資料行中的資料會被假設為非 null。If you set this value to `false`, the data in the corresponding column is assumed to be non-null. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性會複製從方便的屬性。This property is duplicated from the property for convenience. 方法只會使用屬性。The method uses only the property. 基於這個理由，您必須指定資料行是否可以包含 null 值在屬性也。For this reason, you must specify whether a column can contain null values in the property also. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定資料庫資料行的型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the database column.

value.span: 指定 TRANSACT-SQL 資料表宣告中定義的資料行的確切文字的字串值。

span.span: String value that specifies the exact text that defines the column in a Transact-SQL table declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定 T-SQL 資料表宣告中定義的資料行的確切文字。Use this property to specify the exact text that defines the column in a Transact-SQL table declaration. 指定屬性，只有當您打算使用來建立資料庫的執行個體。Specify the property only if you plan to use to create an instance of the database. 預設值推斷的成員型別。The default value of is inferred from the member type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [SQL-CLR 類型對應](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/sql-clr-type-mapping.md)。For more information, see [SQL-CLR Type Mapping](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/sql-clr-type-mapping.md). ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#4)]

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行是否為資料庫中的計算資料行。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a column is a computed column in a database.
Default = empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性，當您使用資料行定義為包含計算的值。Use this property when you use to define a column as containing computed values. 例如，如果您想要建立為 SQL 中所定義的資料行`InventoryVal AS UnitPrice * UnitsInStock`，使用下列*運算式*字串： `"UnitPrice * UnitsInStock"`。For example, if you want to create a column defined in SQL as `InventoryVal AS UnitPrice * UnitsInStock`, use the following *expression* string: `"UnitPrice * UnitsInStock"`. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 不支援以計算資料行做為主索引鍵。 does not support computed columns as primary keys. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#5)]

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行是否包含資料庫自動產生的值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a column contains values that the database auto-generates.
Default = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 插入資料的資料列，而之後可供使用的成員之後，立即同步處理成員完成。 members are synchronized immediately after the row of data is inserted, and the members are available after is completed. > [!NOTE] > 如果資料行包含主索引鍵值，且您指定作為`true`，您還應該加入使用的屬性`IDENTITY`修飾詞。If the column holds primary key values and you designate as `true`, you should also add the property by using the `IDENTITY` modifier. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#6)]

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行是否包含 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 繼承階層架構的鑑別子值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a column contains a discriminator value for a [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] inheritance hierarchy.
Default = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`true`，這個屬性會識別為保留繼承階層架構的鑑別子值類別成員。When `true`, this property identifies the class member as holding the discriminator value for an inheritance hierarchy. 您可以將此屬性設定為`true`不必須隸屬於最上方的多個成員對應階層中的類別。You can set this property to `true` for no more than one member, which must belong to the topmost mapped class in the hierarchy. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsPrimaryKey { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsPrimaryKey : bool with get, set

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定這個類別成員是否表示資料表主索引鍵一部分或全部的資料行。

span.span: Gets or sets whether this class member represents a column that is part or all of the primary key of the table.
Default = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 假設的實體類別，您必須提供這個屬性，至少一個成員，它必須對應到主索引鍵或唯一索引鍵對應的資料表或檢視表中。Assuming an entity class, you must provide at least one member with this attribute, and it must be mapped to the primary key or a unique key in the corresponding table or view. 無法執行此提示[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]考慮為唯讀狀態將變更提交至資料庫類別的執行個體。Failure to do this prompts [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] to consider instances of the class as read-only for submitting changes to the database. 如果您使用這個屬性來指定多個成員的類別，金鑰即為相關聯的資料行的複合。If you designate more than one member of the class by using this property, the key is said to be a composite of the associated columns. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 不支援以計算資料行做為主索引鍵。 does not support computed columns as primary keys. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#8)]

member this.IsVersion : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定成員的資料行型別是否為資料庫時間戳記或版本號碼。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the column type of the member is a database timestamp or version number.
Default value = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本號碼遞增，並會更新相關聯的資料列，每次更新時間戳記資料行。Version numbers are incremented and timestamp columns are updated every time that the associated row is updated. (這個屬性會告知[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]，應更新的資料行，以顯示它是新的版本; 它不要記錄的資訊，例如哪些人進行了更新。)(This property tells [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] that a column should be updated to show that it is a new version; it is not meant to record information such as who made the update.) 請注意下列事項時`IsVersion`成立：Note the following when `IsVersion` is true: - 使用指定正確的修飾詞，以指定版本號碼或時間戳記資料行。Use to specify the correct modifiers to designate a version number or timestamp column. 如果您未指定，[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]推斷正確的修飾詞。If you do not specify , [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] infers the correct modifiers. 版本號碼遞增，並會更新相關聯的資料列，每次更新時間戳記資料行。Version numbers are incremented and timestamp columns are updated every time that the associated row is updated. 具有成員`IsVersion=true`立即更新資料列之後，才會同步處理。Members with `IsVersion=true` are synchronized immediately after the data row is updated. 新的值便可見之後完成。The new values are visible after finishes. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck UpdateCheck { System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck get(); void set(System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck value); };

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 如何處理開放式並行存取 (Optimistic Concurrency) 衝突的偵測。

span.span: Gets or sets how [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] approaches the detection of optimistic concurrency conflicts.

value.span: 除非成員的 為 ，否則預設 = 。

span.span: Default = , unless is for a member.
Other values are and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用三個列舉的其中一個使用這個屬性時，它會決定如何[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]會偵測並行衝突。When this property is used with one of three enums, it determines how [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] detects concurrency conflicts. 如果沒有任何成員設計成`IsVersion=true`，原始的成員值與目前的資料庫狀態進行比較。If no member is designed as `IsVersion=true`, original member values are compared with the current database state. 可使用下列的列舉：The following enums are available: - `Always` 衝突偵測，一律使用這個資料行。`Always` Always use this column for conflict detection. - `Never` 永遠不會用於衝突偵測的這個資料行。`Never` Never use this column for conflict detection. - `WhenChanged` 只在應用程式已變更之成員時，請使用此資料行。`WhenChanged` Use this column only when the member has been changed by the application. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#10)]
